name: Google Takeout
notes: Comprehensive tool for most Google services (Gmail, Drive, Photos, etc.). Larger exports may take longer.

name: Facebook
notes: The 'Download Your Information' tool lets you get posts, photos, messages, and more. Format and media quality are customizable.

name: Twitter (X)
notes: Your archive includes tweets, DMs, media, and follower lists. You'll be notified via email when it's ready.

name: Instagram
notes: Request your data via settings. Includes photos, videos, and comments. Download link is valid for 4 days.

name: LinkedIn
notes: Offers multiple archives: connections, messages, job applications, etc. Typically available quickly.

name: GitHub
notes: Account data download is available. For repositories, use standard Git clone operations. Issues/PRs via API.

name: Spotify
notes: Includes personal data and streaming history. Can take up to 30 days for the full archive to be prepared.

name: Reddit
notes: Includes posts, comments, messages, and saved content. You will get a notification when it's ready for download.

name: Netflix
notes: Download viewing history, interaction data, and payment information. Usually available very quickly.

name: Twitch
notes: Request your data from privacy settings. May take several days for extensive chat logs or broadcast history.

name: Discord
notes: Request all your data via User Settings > Privacy & Safety. Includes messages, servers, settings, and more.

name: Microsoft Account
notes: Download data across Outlook, Xbox, search history, Edge, etc. Provides granular control over data types.

name: Amazon
notes: Request data like orders, payment history, and customer service interactions. Typically provided within 24-48 hours.

name: Apple (Privacy Portal)
notes: Comprehensive request for data across iCloud, Apple ID, App Store, etc. Can take up to 7 days to prepare.

name: Adobe
notes: Request a copy of personal data, product usage data, and content stored in Adobe services like Creative Cloud.

name: Zoom
notes: Request a copy of your data, including meeting logs, chat history, and account activity from 'Data Management'.

name: Slack
notes: Workspace owners can export data from all channels. Individuals can export their own DM history.

name: TikTok
notes: Download your data in the 'Settings and privacy' menu. Includes profile info, activity, and app settings.

name: Pinterest
notes: You can request your data, which includes your pins, boards, and account history, from the privacy settings page.

name: Dropbox
notes: While you can download all files easily, account information can be requested through their help/privacy section.

name: Steam
notes: Request your data from the Steam Support page. It can take up to 30 days and includes purchase history, community content, etc.

name: PayPal
notes: You can request reports of your transaction history and other account data from the data and privacy settings.

name: Notion
notes: Workspace owners can export the entire workspace. Individual users can export pages one by one. Available in settings.

name: Trello
notes: Board data can be exported in JSON format from the board menu. Business Class allows CSV exports. Personal data export is also available.

name: Telegram
notes: Data export is only available through the Telegram Desktop application. Go to Settings > Advanced > Export Telegram Data.
